title: Community Site: Development - AIM
description: The site helps onboard 1000s of users. New features are requested & ideated, upgrades are required. Bounty system needs further development.
solution: Improvements will give more information to the community, will provide a better experience and keep the site a valuable onboarding platform.
experience: Community landing page, active CAs, Community-Tools, Designers, Developers and community members.
